name: burrito_meat
recipe: Chop and cook the meat in pan, cook the rice in pot, then put cooked meat and cooked rice together with a raw tortilla to a plate to make a burrito with meat.

name: burrito_chicken
recipe: Chop and cook the chicken in pan, cook the rice in pot, then put cooked chicken and cooked rice together with a raw tortilla to a plate to make a burrito with chicken.

name: burrito_mushroom
recipe: Chop and cook the mushroom in pan, cook the rice in pot, then put cooked mushroom and cooked rice together with a raw tortilla to a plate to make a burrito with mushroom.
